reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Once you go Proraso , you won't go back to any other shaving foam !
reviews.reviewText: I originally decided to try Proraso after Esquire Magazine endorsed it. I had been a big fan of Noxzema's Menthol shaving cream (in the classic blue can) but sadly that became harder and harder to find and I believe it has been discontinued. Barbasol has/had a menthol option but I was not impressed with it. I was a bit apprehensive at first due to the price but after the first week I was completely converted. The Proraso is not quite as strong in terms of menthol as the classic Noxzema was but it is by no means subtle and I suspect that if you are a menthol fan (like myself) you will be more than satisfied. I would give it 5 stars based solely on the quality of the shave and skin feel but I was pleasantly surprised by two other aspects of the product. First, as other reviewers have mentioned, you only need a small dollop of this stuff to get a good shave. I shave almost every day and my original can has lasted over 10 months. Second, I do not know what kind of old world Italian magic Proraso is putting in this stuff but my skin has never looked or felt better. This was completely unexpected. It is not often when a product exceeds your expectations to such a high degree but I must say it is literally and figuratively refreshing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's worth it
reviews.reviewText: This may cost a few dollars more but the difference is amazing.That menthol and thickness delivers a premium shaving experience. It's so rich and thick out of the spout, you only need a small dabberoo.I only shave once a week, so one can will literally last me for YEARS. (My previous can lasted 3 years and still had life in it when I bought this one) Paying 12 bucks for even a slightly better product than Gillette Foamy or a store brand is a no brainer over the long haul.I combine this shaving cream with the Henson safety razor and I actually ENJOY shaving now. Never had a better shave. My face feels 'alive' after I finish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really like how good it is for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried a couple other shavings brands but this one doesn’t irritate my skin at all after shaving. Usually I need to use cooling aftershave with cheaper brands like Gillette but this is fine alone. If you use the pre shave with the foam, and after shave that would probably give you the best shave possible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very tingly foam with the menthol
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to replace my old style that worked really well with a badger brush. This one works fine although I favor the old style that I cannot get anymore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So good. This is luxury shaving.
reviews.reviewText: The smoothest shaving cream I've ever used. I still use cremo & secret shave when i'm in a hurry but the Proraso Shaving Foam is a whole other level of smooth. It's now my go to. It feels great on your face & smooth as butter. I have a few other shaving bowls & creams but Proraso just works for me. I get an irritation free shave everytime despite having mildly sensitive skin. I use this method.After a shower & gentle face cleanser, i start with the Proraso Pre shave & a warm barbers towel let that sit on my face for a couple minutes. Next apply some of this great shaving foam, do a down pass, reapply for an up pass & check for anything i missed. Then i apply just a small amount for a 3rd & final light cleanup pass. Rinse with some cold water on my face & Dab (not wipe) with a dry towel before applying some Proraso aftershave. The one for sensitive skin works well but i really like the way the classic green line smells & performs. I never have irritation after i shave like this. And i always use a light facial moisturizer/lotion when i'm done shaving & use something with vitamin E under the eyes. 15 minutes & i'm confident & ready for the day. I can't say enough about this Shaving Foam. If you want to know what all the hype is about treat yourself to a great shave with a can of Proraso classic green Eucalyptus Shaving Foam. In a can, the tube or a bowl. They all work great but like that the can takes less time. Try it if you haven't already, you'll be glad you did and the can lasts a while so it's a good value too. Happy Shaving!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this, perfect thickness and moist level. Smells great. I love it. My brother buys Dollar Store shaving foam and he happy with it. Me? I am a Proraso man and it's worth the extra money for a premium foam. So it's all subjective. I love this stuff. I also use their shave soap when I have the time to spin my own foam with a brush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I buy this for my Dad
reviews.reviewText: My Dad totally misses his Foamy Menthol and although this is not exactly the same (he says the cooling is there, but the scent is more cologne-like), it's still a suitable replacement for him.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A fine shave
reviews.reviewText: This shaving crème is very good and priced right

Mit den Jahren habe ich ja so manchen, z. T. via Werbung hochgelobten, Rasierschaum gekauft und eingesetzt. Dabei waren diverse Schäume und Gele, mit ebenso diverser Leistungsfähigkeit in Sachen Auftragen, Gleitfähigkeit der Klingen und Hautgefühl nach vollendeter Rasur. Dieses Produkt hat mich restlos überzeugt und ich frage mich, warum ist mir dieses Produkt nicht schon eher begegnet? Offenbar ist es nicht nötig fett beworben zu werden, denn er spricht für sich selbst und wird daher mit Sicherheit gerne unter Freunden weiterempfohlen.Walnussgroß auf die Hand gesprüht, lässt er sich wunderbar leicht auf dem gereinigten Gesicht verteilen und bildet einen gleichmäßig dünnen Schaumfilm. Die Klinge gleitet durch die Stoppeln wie durch warme Butter und der Teint erfährt eine belebende Frische, dank eines Hauchs von Menthol. Dabei erlebe ich die Rasur sehr schonend für die Haut, denn es bleibt kein Rasurbrand und die Haut trocknet auch nicht aus, nachdem ich sie mit einem Schwall kaltem Wasser von den Schaumresten befreit habe. Außerdem weiß ich es zu schätzen, dass sich die Zwischenräume der Rasierklingen nicht so leicht zusetzten und verkleben, wie ich es leider, speziell bei der Verwendung von Rasiergel, häufig erleben musste.Fazit: Dieses kleine Highlight am Morgen kann ich nur empfehlen!
Este espuma es simplemente lo mejor. Es muy refrescante y el olor es perfecto para empezar el día.
rien a avoir avec les marques qu on trouve en sgrande surface, mousse compact, bouteille pleine, pas de perte de pression de la bouteille
